Quick search

PurposeÂ¶

Make off-the-shelf knowledge modelling for a range of domains in Grakn:

  • Convert well-established ontologies into the powerful Grakn hypergraph data model

  • Provide modules for importing and querying data from the Python API

  • Add 'Knowledge Graph Convolutional Network <https://github.com/graknlabs/kglib/tree/master/kglib/kgcn>' and other algorithms as they become available
